title: Toaru Majutsu no Index - How About Accelerator and Move Point? (Doujinshi)
description:
Meet the memebers of GROUP: Awaki Musujime, Accelerator, Motoharu Tsuchimikado and Mitsuki Unabara. In this doujinshi series, all of them get along (it doesn't really happen in the novels). Not to mention, two of the members, Awaki and Accelerator, are getting along extremely well. Follow the sweet, comedic romantic adventures of the couple AcceleratorxAwaki from To Aru Majutsu no Index in this full length 4koma Pixiv doujinshi.

There are 7 chapters in total.

Original pixiv doujinshi: http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=763885
